message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $80?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $90?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $85? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more than $80, but $90 is still a bit too high for me.
I understand you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $92?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $92 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I think $87 is the most I can afford. Can you meet me at $87?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $95?
I'm really interested in the product, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I think $88 is the absolute most I can afford. Can you meet me at $88?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $91?
I appreciate all the compromises you've made, Alice, but $91 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better price. Can you meet me at $89?
